mapper.select: /* eventDAO.eventDashList */ select a.event_no , a.hakwon_no , d.hakwon_name , a.event_title , date_format(a.begin_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as begin_date , date_format(a.end_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as end_date , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date , date_format(a.udp_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as udp_date , (select count(1) from tb_content_read where content_type = '003' and content_parent_no = a.event_no and user_no = #{user_no}) as read_status from tb_hakwon_member c , tb_event a , tb_hakwon d where c.user_no = #{user_no} and c.hakwon_no = a.hakwon_no and a.event_status = '001' and c.hakwon_no = d.hakwon_no and d.hakwon_status in ('001', '003') and now() between a.begin_date and a.end_date order by a.end_date desc , a.event_no desc limit 3

/* eventDAO.eventList */ select a.event_no , a.hakwon_no , a.event_title , a.reg_user_no , date_format(a.begin_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as begin_date , date_format(a.end_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as end_date , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date , date_format(a.udp_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as udp_date , case when now() between a.begin_date and a.end_date then 'Y' else 'N' end as ing_yn , (select count(1) from tb_content_read where content_type = '003' and content_parent_no = a.event_no and user_no = #{user_no}) as read_status from tb_event a where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and a.event_status = '001' and now() between a.begin_date and a.end_date order by a.event_no desc limit #{start_no}, #{page_scale}
/* eventDAO.eventListTotCount */ select count(1) from tb_event a where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and a.event_status = '001' and now() between a.begin_date and a.end_date

/* eventDAO.eventDetail */ select a.event_no , a.hakwon_no , a.event_title , a.event_content , a.reg_user_no , b.user_name as reg_user_name , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date , date_format(a.udp_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as udp_date , date_format(a.begin_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as begin_date , date_format(a.end_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as end_date , a.recommend_yn , a.add_info_title , event_user.recommend_user_no , case when event_user.recommend_user_no > 0 then (select user_id from tb_user where user_no = event_user.recommend_user_no) end as recommend_user_id , event_user.user_info , count(event_user.user_no) as event_join_count from tb_event a left join tb_event_user event_user on a.event_no = event_user.event_no and event_user.user_no = #{user_no} , tb_user_info b where a.event_no = #{event_no} and a.event_status = '001' and a.reg_user_no = b.user_no

/* eventDAO.eventMyJoinList */ select a.event_no , a.user_no , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as join_date , b.event_title , b.event_content , b.event_status , date_format(b.begin_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as begin_date , date_format(b.end_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as end_date , b.hakwon_no , c.hakwon_name , c.logo_file_no , get_file_path(c.logo_file_no) as logo_file_path from tb_event_user a , tb_event b , tb_hakwon_info c where a.user_no = #{user_no} and a.event_no = b.event_no and b.hakwon_no = c.hakwon_no order by a.event_no desc limit #{start_no}, #{page_scale}
/* eventDAO.eventMyJoinListTotCount */ select count(1) from tb_event_user a , tb_event b , tb_hakwon_info c where a.user_no = #{user_no} and a.event_no = b.event_no and b.hakwon_no = c.hakwon_no
